trans-unit.source: Create Share
trans-unit.target: Create Share

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Create Share</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation creates a new share under the specified account.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Create Share</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation creates a new share under the specified account.

trans-unit.source: If the share with the same name already exists, the operation fails.
trans-unit.target: If the share with the same name already exists, the operation fails.

trans-unit.source: The share resource includes metadata and properties for that share.
trans-unit.target: The share resource includes metadata and properties for that share.

trans-unit.source: It does not include a list of the files contained by the share.
trans-unit.target: It does not include a list of the files contained by the share.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Create Share</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Create Share</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:

trans-unit.source: Path Component
trans-unit.target: Path Component

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: myaccount
trans-unit.target: myaccount

trans-unit.source: The name of your storage account.
trans-unit.target: The name of your storage account.

trans-unit.source: myshare
trans-unit.target: myshare

trans-unit.source: The name of your file share.
trans-unit.target: The name of your file share.

trans-unit.source: Note that it may include only lower-case characters.
trans-unit.target: Note that it may include only lower-case characters.

trans-unit.source: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.
trans-unit.target: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Headers
trans-unit.target: Request Headers

trans-unit.source: The following table describes required and optional request headers.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes required and optional request headers.

trans-unit.source: Request Header
trans-unit.target: Request Header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the authentication scheme, account name, and signature.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>
trans-unit.target: <parameterReference>Date</parameterReference> or <parameterReference>x-ms-date</parameterReference>

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: Required.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time for the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) time for the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="96cec7bc-63cc-4227-920a-dddd850433c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authentication Schemes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Required for all authenticated requests.
trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the version of the operation to use for this request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="cc4fba5c-7015-40bf-a29c-b6f0c684ff3c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Storage Service Versioning</link>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A name-value pair to associate with the share as metadata.
trans-unit.target: A name-value pair to associate with the share as metadata.

trans-unit.source: Metadata names must adhere to the naming rules for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670%28VS.71%29.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Metadata names must adhere to the naming rules for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670%28VS.71%29.aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Supported in version 2015-02-21 and above.
trans-unit.target: Supported in version 2015-02-21 and above.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum size of the share, in gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum size of the share, in gigabytes.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than 0, and less than or equal to 5TB (5120).
trans-unit.target: Must be greater than 0, and less than or equal to 5TB (5120).

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Sample Request
trans-unit.target: Sample Request

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code and a set of response headers.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 201 (Created).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Headers
trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response may also include additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The ETag contains a value which represents the version of the share, in quotes.
trans-unit.target: The ETag contains a value which represents the version of the share, in quotes.

trans-unit.source: Returns the date and time the share was last modified.
trans-unit.target: Returns the date and time the share was last modified.

trans-unit.source: The date format follows RFC 1123.
trans-unit.target: The date format follows RFC 1123.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="d4f67d84-a51c-4ff7-8bd0-0ae206c9e3c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Representation of Date/Time Values</link>.

trans-unit.source: Any operation that modifies the share or its properties or metadata updates the last modified time.
trans-unit.target: Any operation that modifies the share or its properties or metadata updates the last modified time.

trans-unit.source: Operations on files do not affect the last modified time of the share.
trans-unit.target: Operations on files do not affect the last modified time of the share.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the account owner may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: Shares are created immediately beneath the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Shares are created immediately beneath the storage account.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to nest one share beneath another.
trans-unit.target: It's not possible to nest one share beneath another.

trans-unit.source: You can specify metadata for a share at the time it is created by including one or more metadata headers on the request.
trans-unit.target: You can specify metadata for a share at the time it is created by including one or more metadata headers on the request.

trans-unit.source: The format for the metadata header is <parameterReference>x-ms-meta-name:value</parameterReference>.
trans-unit.target: The format for the metadata header is <parameterReference>x-ms-meta-name:value</parameterReference>.

trans-unit.source: If a share by the same name is being deleted when <languageKeyword>Create Share</languageKeyword> is called, the server will return status code 409 (Conflict), with additional error information indicating that the share is being deleted.
trans-unit.target: If a share by the same name is being deleted when <languageKeyword>Create Share</languageKeyword> is called, the server will return status code 409 (Conflict), with additional error information indicating that the share is being deleted.

trans-unit.source: The share size quota can be used to limit the size of files stored on the share.
trans-unit.target: The share size quota can be used to limit the size of files stored on the share.

trans-unit.source: It does not limit the size of snapshots.
trans-unit.target: It does not limit the size of snapshots.

trans-unit.source: The overhead associated with files that is used in computing the billing size for the storage account is not accounted for in the quota.
trans-unit.target: The overhead associated with files that is used in computing the billing size for the storage account is not accounted for in the quota.

trans-unit.source: When the sum of the sizes of the files on the share exceeds the quota set on the share, attempts to increase the size of a file will fail, and creating new non-empty files (via REST) will fail.
trans-unit.target: When the sum of the sizes of the files on the share exceeds the quota set on the share, attempts to increase the size of a file will fail, and creating new non-empty files (via REST) will fail.

trans-unit.source: You will still be able to create empty files.
trans-unit.target: You will still be able to create empty files.

trans-unit.source: Changing or setting the quota has no effect on billing.
trans-unit.target: Changing or setting the quota has no effect on billing.

trans-unit.source: You will still be billed for the size of the files plus the overhead.
trans-unit.target: You will still be billed for the size of the files plus the overhead.
